text: The 2018–19 Hong Kong First Division League was the 5th season of Hong Kong First Division since it became the second-tier football league in Hong Kong in 2014–15. The season began on 9 September 2018 and ended on 12 May 2019. ==Teams== ===Changes from last season=== ====From First Division==== =====Promoted to the Hong Kong Premier League===== * Hoi King =====Relegated to the Second Division===== * Sun Hei * Tung Sing * Kwun Tong * Wan Chai ====To First Division==== =====Relegated from the Premier League===== * Rangers =====Promoted from the Second Division===== * Happy Valley * Central & Western ==League table== ==References== Category:Hong Kong First Division League seasons Category:2018–19 in Hong Kong football Hong Kong
title: 2018–19 Hong Kong First Division League
